query:
UPDATE event SET
                location_id = $2,
                name_nl = $3,
                name_en = $4,
                image = $5,
                start_dates = $6,
                end_dates = $7,
                description_nl = $8,
                description_en = $9,
                registration_start = $10,
                registration_end = $11,
                registration_max = $12,
                waiting_list_max = $13,
                is_published = $14,
                required_membership_status = $15::membership_status[],
                event_type = $16,
                questions = $17,
                metadata = $18,
                created_by = $19,
                updated = now()
            WHERE id = $1
